languages.text: {n}Голос в воксе умолкает, но тишина длится лишь мгновение. Затем хор голосов — сотни, а может и тысячи — взрывается в вашей голове, повторяя и повторяя последнюю фразу Кунрада. В точности как атаковавшие вас мутанты. Хор звучит так громко, так яростно, что кажется, что ваши барабанные перепонки лопнут, не выдержав напряжения. Достигнув пика, хор взрывается агонией предсмертных криков и хрипов. А затем стихает. Кровь бешено стучит у вас в ушах.{/n}

{n}The voice in the vox falls silent, but the silence only lasts a moment. Then a chorus of voices — hundreds, possibly thousands — explodes inside your head, repeating Kunrad's last phrase over and over again. Just like the mutants who attacked you. The chorus is so loud and fierce that you feel your eardrums might burst from the tension. Reaching a crescendo, the voices erupt in an agony of death cries and rattles. Then they fall silent. You feel your blood pounding in your ears.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Голос в воксе умолкает, но тишина длится лишь мгновение. Затем хор голосов — сотни, а может и тысячи — взрывается в вашей голове, повторяя и повторяя последнюю фразу Кунрада. В точности как атаковавшие вас мутанты. Хор звучит так громко, так яростно, что кажется, что ваши барабанные перепонки лопнут, не выдержав напряжения. Достигнув пика, хор взрывается агонией предсмертных криков и хрипов. А затем стихает. Кровь бешено стучит у вас в ушах.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The voice in the vox falls silent, but the silence only lasts a moment. Then a chorus of voices — hundreds, possibly thousands — explodes inside your head, repeating Kunrad's last phrase over and over again. Just like the mutants who attacked you. The chorus is so loud and fierce that you feel your eardrums might burst from the tension. Reaching the climax, the voices erupt with the agony of death cries and rattles. Then they die down. You feel your blood pounding in your ears.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ヴォクスの声は静まったが、沈黙はすぐに破られた。何百、何千もの声が頭の中に響き、自分を攻撃してきた変異体たちのようにクンラッドの最後の言葉を何度も反復する。合唱はあまりにも激しく、緊張のあまり鼓膜が破れそうなほどだ。声が最高潮に達すると、死者の断末魔ともがく音に変わった。そして、静寂に包まれた。耳の中で脈が激しく鼓動するのを感じる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The voice in the vox falls silent, but the silence only lasts a moment. Then a chorus of voices — hundreds, possibly thousands — explodes inside your head, repeating Kunrad's last phrase over and over again. Just like the mutants who attacked you. The chorus is so loud and fierce that you feel your eardrums might burst from the tension. Reaching a crescendo, the voices erupt in an agony of death cries and rattles. Then they fall silent. You feel your blood pounding in your ears.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォクスの声は静まったが、沈黙はすぐに破られた。何百、何千もの声が頭の中に響き、自分を攻撃してきた変異体たちのようにクンラッドの最後の言葉を何度も反復する。合唱はあまりにも激しく、緊張のあまり鼓膜が破れそうなほどだ。声が最高潮に達すると、死者の断末魔ともがく音に変わった。そして、静寂に包まれた。耳の中で脈が激しく鼓動するのを感じる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}音阵装置中的声音沉寂下来，但只安静了一会儿。在那之后，成百上千个声音在你脑海中炸开，一遍又一遍地重复着昆拉德的最后一句话。那些声音的合奏，就像袭击你的变种人一样狂暴，你感觉你的鼓膜仿佛都要被震裂了。随后声音达到了高潮，哭号和震颤在死亡般的痛苦中迸发出来，之后归于寂静，但你感觉耳朵里的血液依然在剧烈地搏动着。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The voice in the vox falls silent, but the silence only lasts a moment. Then a chorus of voices — hundreds, possibly thousands — explodes inside your head, repeating Kunrad's last phrase over and over again. Just like the mutants who attacked you. The chorus is so loud and fierce that you feel your eardrums might burst from the tension. Reaching a crescendo, the voices erupt in an agony of death cries and rattles. Then they fall silent. You feel your blood pounding in your ears.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}音阵装置中的声音沉寂下来，但只安静了一会儿。在那之后，成百上千个声音在你脑海中炸开，一遍又一遍地重复着昆拉德的最后一句话。那些声音的合奏，就像袭击你的变种人一样狂暴，你感觉你的鼓膜仿佛都要被震裂了。随后声音达到了高潮，哭号和震颤在死亡般的痛苦中迸发出来，之后归于寂静，但你感觉耳朵里的血液依然在剧烈地搏动着。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La voz del voco calla, pero el silencio es momentáneo. Un coro de voces estalla en tu mente. Son cientos, posiblemente miles, y todas repiten la última frase de Kunrad una y otra vez. Igual que los mutantes que te habían atacado. El coro es tan ruidoso y fiero que sientes que los tímpanos te van a estallar. El crescendo termina con una serie agónica de gritos de muerte y estertores. Después se produce el silencio. La sangre retumba en tus oídos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The voice in the vox falls silent, but the silence only lasts a moment. Then a chorus of voices — hundreds, possibly thousands — explodes inside your head, repeating Kunrad's last phrase over and over again. Just like the mutants who attacked you. The chorus is so loud and fierce that you feel your eardrums might burst from the tension. Reaching a crescendo, the voices erupt in an agony of death cries and rattles. Then they fall silent. You feel your blood pounding in your ears.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz del voco calla, pero el silencio es momentáneo. Un coro de voces estalla en tu mente. Son cientos, posiblemente miles, y todas repiten la última frase de Kunrad una y otra vez. Igual que los mutantes que te habían atacado. El coro es tan ruidoso y fiero que sientes que los tímpanos te van a estallar. El crescendo termina con una serie agónica de gritos de muerte y estertores. Después se produce el silencio. La sangre retumba en tus oídos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le vox se tait, mais son silence n'est qu'éphémère : un chœur mêlant des centaines ou des milliers de voix retentit soudain dans votre crâne, répétant en boucle la dernière phrase de Kunrad, exactement comme les mutants qui vous ont {mf|attaqué|attaquée}. L'écho est si fort et si violent que vous avez l'impression que vos tympans vont exploser. Avec un crescendo, les voix lancent des hurlements et des râles d'agonie, puis se taisent. Vous sentez les battements de votre cœur dans vos oreilles.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The voice in the vox falls silent, but the silence only lasts a moment. Then a chorus of voices — hundreds, possibly thousands — explodes inside your head, repeating Kunrad's last phrase over and over again. Just like the mutants who attacked you. The chorus is so loud and fierce that you feel your eardrums might burst from the tension. Reaching a crescendo, the voices erupt in an agony of death cries and rattles. Then they fall silent. You feel your blood pounding in your ears.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vox se tait, mais son silence n'est qu'éphémère : un chœur mêlant des centaines ou des milliers de voix retentit soudain dans votre crâne, répétant en boucle la dernière phrase de Kunrad, exactement comme les mutants qui vous ont {mf|attaqué|attaquée}. L'écho est si fort et si violent que vous avez l'impression que vos tympans vont exploser. Avec un crescendo, les voix lancent des hurlements et des râles d'agonie, puis se taisent. Vous sentez les battements de votre cœur dans vos oreilles.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Stimme in dem Vox verstummt, aber die Stille währt nur kurz. Dann explodiert ein Chor von Stimmen – Hunderte, vielleicht Tausende – in deinem Kopf und wiederholt Kunrads letzten Satz immer und immer wieder. Genau wie die Mutanten, die dich angegriffen haben. Der Chor ist so laut und dröhnend, dass du das Gefühl hast, deine Trommelfelle müssten gleich platzen. Die Stimmen erreichen ein Crescendo und kulminieren in einer Agonie aus Todesschreien und Röcheln. Dann verstummen sie. Du spürst, wie das Blut in deinen Ohren pocht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The voice in the vox falls silent, but the silence only lasts a moment. Then a chorus of voices — hundreds, possibly thousands — explodes inside your head, repeating Kunrad's last phrase over and over again. Just like the mutants who attacked you. The chorus is so loud and fierce that you feel your eardrums might burst from the tension. Reaching a crescendo, the voices erupt in an agony of death cries and rattles. Then they fall silent. You feel your blood pounding in your ears.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Stimme in dem Vox verstummt, aber die Stille währt nur kurz. Dann explodiert ein Chor von Stimmen – Hunderte, vielleicht Tausende – in deinem Kopf und wiederholt Kunrads letzten Satz immer und immer wieder. Genau wie die Mutanten, die dich angegriffen haben. Der Chor ist so laut und dröhnend, dass du das Gefühl hast, deine Trommelfelle müssten gleich platzen. Die Stimmen erreichen ein Crescendo und kulminieren in einer Agonie aus Todesschreien und Röcheln. Dann verstummen sie. Du spürst, wie das Blut in deinen Ohren pocht.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vokstaki ses kesilmekle birlikte bu sessizlik, çok kısa sürüyor. Sonrasında zihninde yüzlerce, hatta belki binlerce sesten oluşan bir koro bir anda patlıyor ve Kunrad'ın son sözlerini defalarca tekrar ediyor. Tıpkı sana saldıran mutantların yaptığı gibi. Koro o kadar gürültülü ve şiddetli ki kulak zarlarının gerilmekten patlayacağını hissediyorsun. Sesler giderek yükseliyor, ölüm çığlıklarına ve takırtılara dönüşüyor, ardından kesiliyor. Kulaklarında kendi kalp atışlarını hissedebiliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The voice in the vox falls silent, but the silence only lasts a moment. Then a chorus of voices — hundreds, possibly thousands — explodes inside your head, repeating Kunrad's last phrase over and over again. Just like the mutants who attacked you. The chorus is so loud and fierce that you feel your eardrums might burst from the tension. Reaching a crescendo, the voices erupt in an agony of death cries and rattles. Then they fall silent. You feel your blood pounding in your ears.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Voksundaki ses kesiliyor ancak bu sessizlik çok kısa sürüyor. Ardından zihninde yüzlerce, hatta belki binlerce sesten oluşan bir koro bir anda patlıyor ve Kunrad'ın son sözlerini defalarca tekrar ediyor. Tıpkı sana saldıran mutantların yaptığı gibi. Koro o kadar gürültülü ve şiddetli ki kulak zarlarının gerilmekten patlayacağını hissediyorsun. Sesler giderek yükseliyor, ölüm çığlıklarına ve takırtılara dönüşüyor, ardından ise kesiliyor. Kulaklarında kendi kalp atışlarını hissedebiliyorsun.{/n}
